description: Updates the configuration of an existing pool. You can update the opt-out list, enable or disable two-way messaging, change the TwoWayChannelArn, enable or disable self-managed opt-outs, enable or disable deletion protection, and enable or disable shared routes.

parameters.name: PoolId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the pool to update. Valid values are either the PoolId or PoolArn.

parameters.name: OptOutListName
parameters.description: The OptOutList to associate with the pool. Valid values are either OptOutListName or OptOutListArn.

nested_items.name: PoolId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the pool.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the pool update request.

nested_items.name: MessageType
nested_items.description: The type of message for the pool to use.

nested_items.name: TwoWayEnabled
nested_items.description: By default this is set to false. When set to true you can receive incoming text messages from your end recipients.

nested_items.name: TwoWayChannelArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the two way channel.

nested_items.name: TwoWayChannelRole
nested_items.description: An optional IAM Role Arn for a service to assume, to be able to post inbound SMS messages.

nested_items.name: SelfManagedOptOutsEnabled
nested_items.description: When an end recipient sends a message that begins with HELP or STOP to one of your dedicated numbers, AWS End User Messaging SMS and Voice automatically replies with a customizable message and adds the end recipient to the OptOutList. When set to true you're responsible for responding to HELP and STOP requests. You're also responsible for tracking and honoring opt-out requests.

nested_items.name: OptOutListName
nested_items.description: The name of the OptOutList associated with the pool.

nested_items.name: SharedRoutesEnabled
nested_items.description: Indicates whether shared routes are enabled for the pool.

nested_items.name: DeletionProtectionEnabled
nested_items.description: When set to true the pool can't be deleted.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The time when the pool was created, in UNIX epoch time format.
